item.title: Has Prakash Pipes declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Prakash Pipes Ltd. has declared a 10% dividend, with an ex-date of December 24, 2025. While recent total returns have been negative in shorter periods, longer-term returns show a recovery trend, with a total return of 159.85% over five years. Time: 22 minutes ago

item.title: MOIL . Forms Death Cross Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: Shares of MOIL ., a key player in the Minerals & Mining sector, have recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend and suggests a weakening momentum in the stock’s price action over the medium to long term. Time: 5 hours ago
